mewan awasthawaka kiripiti ratin genwana bahu jathika samagam wisin ma kiripiti thoga sangawa athi bawata chodana ella wi atha.me pilibanda wimasu awasthawedi paribhogika sewa adhikariye sabhapathi rum marsuk mahatha pawasuwe welenda pole kiripiti hingayak mawa pamin kuta welendun ha atham kiripiti samagam mila wadi kirimata ganna uthsahaya kisiseth sarthaka nowanu athi bawayi.kiripiti thoga sangawagena sitinne dayi sewima sandaha sodisi kandayam yodawa athi bawa da adala watalim pilibanda warthawak samupakara ha abhyanthara welenda katayuthu amathi jonstan pranandu mahatha wetha labadimata upades labi athi bawa da ee mahatha penwa deyi.kiripiti mila wadi kirimen atham aayathana paribhogika janathawa apahasuwata path kara laba labimata uthsaha daruwa da rajaya ewani ho balapam mangin siya abhimathartha itu kara ganimata ida nodena bawa da marsuk mahatha awadharanaya karayi.samagam wisin karana illim mila kamituwa magin adhyayanaya kara sadharana wisandumakata elambaenawa wina bhanda hingayak mawa pama wenuwen kiripiti thoga sangawimata uthsaha kara hasu wuwahoth eewa rajasanthaka kirimatath adala sakakaruwanta usawi mangin nisi danduwam labadimatath piyawara ganna bawa da sabhapathiwaraya pawasayi.janathawage suba siddhiya udesa thawaduratath watalim kerena athara eewayin labaganna prathipala anuwa idiri piyawara ganna athara kiripiti hingayakin thorawa paribhogikayanta laba dimata awashya piyawara adala amathyanshaya magin danatamath gena athi bawa da rum marsuk mahatha thahawuru karayi.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
